title: Lockheed Martin Cyber Analytics and Information Sharing with MarkLogic
abstract: Cyber intrusion attempts impact the United States in substantial and potentially disastrous ways. As our enemies increase in sophistication, those protecting our national assets must work together to ensure their intrusion attempts do not succeed. The Lockheed Martin Cyber Kill Chain (CKC) is one technique that successfully mitigates Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs), providing a means for net defenders to obtain and maintain information dominance over cyber threats. This session will discuss the Lockheed Martin Cyber Kill Chain methodology, as well as showcase an innovative cyber analytics portal developed on MarkLogic to demonstrate CKC analysis for Big Data information sharing to the US Government.
